home.above_banner_secondary: Touch the models you need to have in your hands
home.content_1: Our company's mission is to provide our customers with the most diverse and high quality adult items possible. We believe that every individual desire and fantasy should be respected and satisfied.
home.content_2: Our products are made from high quality materials and are well tested for your safety and satisfaction. Our goal is to create unforgettable moments of enjoyment and experimentation in the bedroom, nurturing your constant curiosity and ensuring a thoroughly satisfying shopping experience. Discover your new passion on every visit to our online store.
home.feature_1_content: Welcome to Oflesh online store with our limited products! Here you will find the most diverse and attractive products to satisfy your intimate desires with your favorite stars.
home.feature_2_content: Browse our site and choose the right product for you. We guarantee delivery of our products in packages with utmost discretion.
home.feature_3_content: Our goal is to offer high quality products to our customers that never compromise on the quality of your pleasure.

broadcast.text: Free shipping on all orders over 100 BGN!

about.who_are_we_header: Who are we and what is our story?
about.who_are_we_content: We are a manufacturing facility based in Bulgaria that specialises in producing 3D printed products. We make our rollers affordable without compromising their durability because what we value most is the quality of the product and the satisfaction of the user.
about.our_team_content: We are a group of engineering students and together with professionals in the beekeeping area we worked hard and extensively to create a honeycomb roller that will be of use for small and large beekeepers.
about.our_mission_and_values_content: The goal we had set for ourself to achieve was to give an alternative to beekeepers, that is both effective and affordable. We also made sure that the materials used in production are 100% harmless to the bees (officially certified). What we value most is quality and that’s why our rollers are made with the best possible polymers found on the market.

distributors.text_2: is our first distributor in Bulgaria. With their support, you can see in person our limited items and touch them. You can find the Collection of Andjela Tasheva at Sofia, gk. Druzhba 2, bl.304 (next to the Post Office) in Sexwell's main showroom.
